imdb.title: Doragonôtsu: Za rezonansu
imdb.plot: With a deadly asteroid hurtling towards Earth, sexy human Dragonauts in tight uniforms and their curvaceous dragon companions come together to create a formidable fighting force with all the right moves. Caught in the middle of th...

episodes.title: Kyômei: Tsunaida te
episodes.plot: Jins world is rocked by a devastating explosion that changes his life forever. Heartbroken and alone, he struggles to pick up the pieces of his shattered existence.

episodes.title: Ouse: Ogokidasu sekai
episodes.plot: After learning the truth about his family's tragic accident, Jin unknowingly becomes part of an ISDA plot to capture his mysterious new friend.

episodes.title: Kakusei: Tsudoi tsubasa
episodes.plot: Toa attempts to calm Spirytus, but the interference of the Gillard Forces further enrages the rogue dragon - prompting Gio to enter the fray.

episodes.title: Hishô: Ao no hate e
episodes.plot: Jin and Gio have questions, and Toa is the only one who can answer them. To find her, they must steal a ship from the ISDA and chart a course for moon.

episodes.title: Kôsaku: Furidashita ame
episodes.plot: After being abandoned by Gio, Jin is captured by the Gillard Army and used as bait in a sinister plot to capture an authentic, live dragon.

episodes.title: Saikai: Hikareau omoi
episodes.plot: The Lindworm Unit is dispatched to the Moon to assist the Gillard Army in their efforts to capture Toa and Gio. In the meantime, Jin and Toa begin to reconnect.

episodes.title: Tsuioku: Suimen ni utsurishi kokoro
episodes.plot: The Lindworm unit arrives at the Hot Springs with orders to apprehend Jin, Gio, and Toa. But some members of the unit are reluctant to capture the renegade dragons.

episodes.title: Betsuri: Kûkyo yori no hibiki
episodes.plot: Enraged and alone, Kazuki descends into madness. Jin betrays Gio in a desperate attempt to get Toa back - but will her horrifying revelation tear them apart forever?

episodes.title: Ketsui: Shippû wo koete
episodes.plot: When the Gillard Army attacks a shuttle carrying Toa, Jin must set aside painful thoughts of his family's tragic death and join forces with Gio to save her.

episodes.title: Shinjitsu: Kudaketa kagami
episodes.plot: After their battle with the Gillard Army, clashing ideals divide the Lindworm Unit. Gio and Toa are detained by the ISDA - one marked for death and the other for experimentation.

episodes.title: Meidô: Shinjitsu wo motomete
episodes.plot: A Gillard spy kidnaps Toa and delivers her to Prince Asim. While Jin and the renegade Dragonauts hide out, the Fourth Original blazes a deadly and destructive path to Earth.

episodes.title: Kyôshû: Shakunetsu no shisha
episodes.plot: With the Fourth Original on the loose, the ISDA evacuates the city and sends in the Lindworm unit to capture the dragon. Kazuki's seething rage puts Jin and Gio in great danger.

episodes.title: Kôrin: Shimesareta dôhyô
episodes.plot: The Lindworm Unit watches as the Third and Fourth Originals do battle in the sky. Jin and Gio are locked in on Toa's signal, but a terrifying development could make them return to Earth.

episodes.title: Hôyû: Chigaeshi mirai
episodes.plot: As the D Project moves into Phase 7, Jin and Gio decide they must journey to Mars to save Toa. But before they can blast off, Kazuki and Widow make their presence felt.

episodes.title: Hôyô: Yobiau monotachi
episodes.plot: Relations between Gillard and the ISDA grow tense. Jin and Gio break into Asim's compound with help from Akira and Machina, but they might be walking into a trap.

episodes.title: Dôkoku: Hikisakareta unmei
episodes.plot: Jin, Toa, and their comrades take refuge in a lunar hot springs. After noticing something strange about Toa, Akira proposes an official ceremony involving Jin.

episodes.title: Hôkô: Myôjô no moeshi toki
episodes.plot: Machina descends into violent madness after the murder of Akira. Jin, Toa, and Gio attempt to escape, but Asim and his minions stand in their way.

episodes.title: Heion: Karisome no nichijô
episodes.plot: After the disaster on Mars, the ISDA begins systematically imprisoning and eliminating all remaining dragons. Thanatos's response to this genocide threatens to destroy Jin and Toa's happy existence.

episodes.title: Kazoku: Nukumori no kakera
episodes.plot: The ISDA develops a virus capable of destroying Thanatos, but it can only be transmitted by an original dragon. Meanwhile, Jin, Toa, Gio, and Sieglinde plot their counterattack.

episodes.title: Dakkan: Tachikirareta kizuna
episodes.plot: Before the Dragonauts can infiltrate Tartarus and rescue their dragons, Gio mysteriously disappears, and Kazuki shows up looking to settle the score with his old friend Jin.

episodes.title: Ketsubetsu: Keishô seshimono
episodes.plot: Gio bursts back onto the scene with a surprising attack on his former allies. Jin wants answers, but he might not want to hear what Gio has to say.

episodes.title: Shûrai: Shinpan no toki
episodes.plot: Jin and the Dragonauts uncover Commander Sakaki's web of deceit, and the Gillard Army exposes Raum to the anti-Thanatos factor in preparation for her ultimate destiny.

episodes.title: Sange: Kanashimi to kibô to
episodes.plot: Jin and Toa spend a final heartbreaking day together before Jin turns her over to Gio. Toa's reaction to his betrayal quickly makes Jin regret his decision.

episodes.title: Gekirin: Kieyuku ashita
episodes.plot: When the Dragonauts' diplomatic peace mission fails to sway Thanatos, Jin must make a difficult choice. He can either fuse with the mother dragon or lose his beloved Toa forever.

episodes.title: Kyôkei: Eien ni hibikiau yô ni
episodes.plot: Kazuki's valiant attempt to use the Aegis to destroy Thanatos fails. With six billion dragons headed for Earth, humanity's future depends on the love between a boy and his dragon.

episodes.title: Lonely Island: Shut Off from the Din
episodes.plot: The ISDA crew is back in action, but the dragons are acting really strange. Gio is cracking jokes, Howling Star is hiding under tables, and Toa's sexy growl is driving Jin crazy!
